caption.location: Select your server location. Note: Consider the latency differences of each region.
caption.software: Select your desired software and tools from our vast pool of web technologies or simply choose or upload your preferred operating system.
caption.hardware: Select the hardware for your server. You can always scale the hardware of your server whenever required.
caption.hardware.no.products.found: No product information available at the moment
heading.server.title: Server description
caption.server.title: Enter a server name
label.server.title: Title
placeholder.server.title: My homepage
label.enter.startup.script.name: Name of new startup script
placeholder.enter.startup.script.name: install_favourite_packages.sh
caption.select.or.create.keypair: Select an existing key pair or create and download a new one. A key pair consists of a public key that Playmobox, and a private key file that you store. Together, allow you to connect to your instance securely. For systems, the private key file is required to obtain password used to log into your instance. For Linux, the private key file allows you to securely SSH your server.
caption.additional.features: Please select additional features for your server. You can always add those features to your server whenever required.
caption.enable.ddos.protection: Comming soon: Add an additional layer of protection to keep your hosting infrastructure online and operating optimally even when they are the target of attacks.
caption.add.internal.ip: Comming soon: Add an internal IP to this VM
notification.accept.keypair.agreement: You have to accept the terms in the SSH key pair agreement
label.enter.key.pair.name: Name of new key pair
placeholder.enter.key.pair.name: webserver_01
label.keypair.acknowledgment: Accept the SSH key pair agreement
caption.keypair.acknowledgment: I acknowledge that I have access to the selected private key file ({{filename}}), and that without this file, I won't be able to log into my instance.
caption.access.acknowledgment: I acknowledge that I will not be able to connect to this instance unless I already know the password built into this AMI.
button.create.and.download.key.pair: Create key pair and download private key
